title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.35 - Open fires restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 79.35 - Open fires restricted

State Regulations

No person shall start any open fires of any type, including
flare pots, torches or fires in containers formerly used for fuel, oil, paint, or similar flammable material, on any part of the airport without prior written
permission of the airport operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
79.35

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
